# Vulgarity

## Pronunciation

- /vʌlˈɡɜɹɪɾi/

## Meanings
not appropriate, simple, dignified or beautiful; not in the style preferred by the upper classes of society:
### Noun

The quality of being .

---

An offensive or obscene act or expression.




vulgarity
